    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractMedicalSweepRenderer
    Abstract base class for medical sweep renderers (ECG, PPG, IBP, NIRS).
    AbstractSpatialLayer
    Base class for spatial-aware layers using batch mapping and projection.
    AdaptiveFunctionRenderer
    Adaptive function renderer (JDK 25 standard).
    ADXRenderer
    ADXRenderer - Average Directional Index
    AlluvialRenderer
    AlluvialRenderer visualizes changes in structure over time.
    AnalysisGridLayer
    Grid layer for analysis renderers (ACF, FFT, etc.) that use custom axis ranges.
    AnalysisWorker
    Internal worker for performing analytical calculations on primitive arrays.
    AnimationProfile
    Animation doctrine for ArberCharts.
    AnimationUtils
    High-performance animation and interpolation utilities for ArberCharts.
    AnimationUtils.EasingType
    Easing function selector.
    AnomalyEvent
    Anomaly event emitted by predictive and gap renderers.
    AnomalyGapRenderer
    Highlights divergence between the predictive shadow and live data.
    AnomalyLevel
    Severity level for predictive anomaly detection.
    AnomalyListener
    Listener for predictive anomaly events.
    ArberBridgeFactory
    Discovers the best available ArberCanvasProvider via ServiceLoader.
    ArberCanvas
    Core rendering abstraction.
    ArberCanvasProvider
    Service provider for ArberCanvas backends.
    ArberColor
    Core-safe color value (ARGB).
    ArberFont
    Core-safe font descriptor.
    ArberInsets
    Core-safe insets (double precision).
    ArberMatrices
    Convenience constructors for ArberMatrix.
    ArberMatrix
    Minimal 2D transform abstraction for headless rendering.
    ArberNativeExport
    Native export surface for GraalVM shared library builds.
    ArberPoint
    Core-safe point (double precision).
    ArberRect
    Core-safe rectangle (double precision).
    ArberRenderingEngine
    Headless render orchestrator.
    ArberRenderingEngine.RenderTask
     
    ArberSize
    Core-safe size (double precision).
    ArberStroke
    Core-safe stroke descriptor.
    ArberThreadException
    Thrown when an operation is executed on the wrong thread.
    ArcDiagramRenderer
    Arc diagram renderer: draws arcs between points laid out on a single axis.
    AreaRenderer
    Professional, zero-allocation, high-precision area chart renderer.
    ATRRenderer
    ATRRenderer - Average True Range
    AuditTrailRenderer

    Convenience helpers for common axis scale presets.

    BandRenderer
    Band/range-area renderer: draws a band between min and max.
